attributes.action: Make a week 8 days long. With 5 days work and 3 day weekends.
attributes.background:
I am becoming more and more frustrated with my weekends going too quickly... and I'm sure you are too. So let's change this tired old system and give ourselves an extra days rest.

So, if you too are sick of that dreaded Monday morning coming round too quickly, you know what you need to do.
